job.title: Software Engineer, Growth
job.description:
At Ninja, we are building delivery-only convenience stores that deliver in 10 minutes or less. It's a service that feels like magic. We are a rapidly growing startup building an exceptional team. Come be a part of our early journey in becoming a household name in last mile delivery across North America and the world.
We are venture-backed by the same investors of iconic companies like DoorDash.
As one of the first members of the Engineering team, you will need to be a generalist that can contribute at every part of the stack, not only in engineering, but across the whole company. You need to be a product-focused engineer that is highly analytical, and can pull insights from our data to shape our product.
Your responsibilities
